mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.price, c.lesson_num AS lessonNum, s1.title AS subjectLevelOne, s2.title AS subjectLevelTwo, t.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.teacher_id = t.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON c.subject_parent_id = s1.id LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON c.subject_id = s2.id LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.id=cd.id WHERE c.id = #{courseId}
